definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">player_right_click_block</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="block_is_tagged_in"><value name="a"><block type="world_data_blockat"><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">minecraft:beds</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:sleeptime</field><value name="VAL"><block type="world_data_current_time"></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">OR</field><value name="A"><block type="world_data_israining"></block></value><value name="B"><block type="world_data_isthundering"></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_logic"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:rainingSleep</field><value name="VAL"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="variables_set_logic"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:rainingSleep</field><value name="VAL"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
